name: Linde tokenized stock (xStock)
description: Linde xStock (LINx) is a tracker certificate issued as Solana SPL and ERC-20 tokens. LINx tracks the price of Linde plc (the underlying). LINx is designed to give eligible cryptocurrency market participants regulatory-compliant access to the stock price of Linde plc, whilst maintaining the benefits of blockchain technology. Key Benefits Linde is a global leader in industrial gases and engineering, offering a wide range of solutions, technologies, and services to various industries.
